params.user_prompt:
Create a high-quality, realistic background based on '{{step1.output}}', with rich textures, vivid colors, and precise lighting. Capture intricate details to fully bring the scene to life, matching the specified theme—whether natural, urban, futuristic, or fantasy. Ensure all visual elements align seamlessly with the description for an immersive experience.Avoid including the word "waves" in the description. Make sure all elements in the image align with the description provided.

" ' \n\ \n\n \\ do not write in output. Just write a description
